name: Castle Ramble
description:
We are a small indie studio from Spain! At Chorrus Games, we love retro style games so we usually stick to this style, we are the developers of popular traditional platformer Super Oscar and more recently Unbroken Soul an amazing premium adventure our users have been loving so far!


We love getting your feedback so please let us know your opinion or any further improvements you would like to see, we really listen to all our users!


If you enjoy Castle Ramble don’t forget rating or reviewing us, that is really what helps us grow :D
